transcription: Looking for the right vehicle? Check out the 2018 Volkswagen Passat. The Volkswagen Passat is roomy and powerful. It is a supple and controlled ride with a quiet and comfortable ride. Volkswagen brings it all together. This vehicle has less than 30,000 miles. Here are some of this vehicle's great options.  Power steering, cruise control, front floor mats, ABS four wheel, four wheel disc brakes, aluminum wheels, rear defrost, auto off headlights, front wheel drive, AM FM stereo radio, MP3 player. This beauty will even make your house keys jealous. Drive it today.  You  Do  You
